1504930.name: Legends of Astravia Demo
1504930.description:
Legends of Astravia is a charming retro RPG set in a world of magic. You play as Oliver, a mystician on a quest to meet new companions and unravel his complicated past... and the truth behind a mysterious trio's plot to reawaken the Cataclysm. Influenced by 90s and early 2000s-era JRPGs, the game features hybrid time-based battles and an explorable world filled with twisting dungeons and countless secrets.

Experience an hour what the game has to offer in this free demo where you learn the basics, fight battles, and explore a labyrinthine dungeon alongside the enigmatic Azel.

Features

  • Retro 16-bit graphics with a modernized interface and gameplay—enjoy the nostalgia without it feeling dated.
  • Dynamic battles where you feel the constant rhythm of combat as you choose your characters' actions.
  • Explorable overworld that features twisting dungeons, rewarding puzzles, treasure-filled caves and more.
  • Essence: A modular skill system that allows you to exchange abilities between characters and grow without the burden of skill trees or assigning stat points.
  • Avoidable, on-map enemy encounters and 8-directional free movement.

As this is a demo, it may not be a wholly accurate reflection of the final game. Also be advised that it takes place partway through the full game, and save files will not be transferable.

Be sure to keep an eye on developer's logs and view the main page for more information about the full game.
